item.title: My Journey from White Belt to Blue Belt in Jui-Jitsu
item.description: I was promoted to blue belt in Brazilian Jui-Jitsu (BJJ) by master Baret Yoshida. This achievement was long due, and I am very excited about it. Master B (AKA The Finisher!!) does not make it easy, but he makes it worth it. I started training Jui-Jitsu in the middle of my PhD studies. Lifting weights was boring and didn’t even help me get my head off work. I joined an MMA club at the university, and eventually, I started to like the grappling part (beginner-Jui-Jitsu).
